title: Executive Order-Amendment of Civil Service Rules
content: Exceptions from examination are hereby made as follows: One superintendent and the necessary teachers, not exceeding four in number, lot the organization and equipment of a normal school to be established at Albuquerque, N. Mex., this rule to expire by limitation six months after the date of its approval.
citation: Grover Cleveland, Executive Order-Amendment of Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/206375
